directions: Toss cabbage, ramen noodles and seasoning packets, red bell pepper, green onion, almonds, sunflower seeds, sesame seeds, sugar, peanut oil, olive oil, red wine vinegar, and black pepper together in a large resealable bag until evenly mixed.
ingredients: 2 (3 ounce) packages ramen noodles, broken into small pieces
title: Cabbage Ramen Salad
